articles.author: Antoinette Tyrrell
articles.title: Urgent Response Needed to Measles Outbreak in Europe - European Views
articles.description: The WHO European Region is calling for an urgent response to the measles outbreak surging across the region.
articles.content: Updated data from 2023 released by the WHO has highlighted the urgency of a swift and concerted response to measles outbreaks in the WHO European Region. Last year, more than 58,000 people in 41 of t… [+2500 chars]

articles.author: Deutsche Welle
articles.title: European satellite falls back to Earth after 29 years - DW (English)
articles.description: A satellite has broken apart and reentered the Earth's atmosphere after almost three decades in orbit. Much of the ERS-2 satellite burned up in the atmosphere while some fragments fell into the North Pacific Ocean.
articles.content: A European satellite launched in 1995 to observe Earth and ended its mission 13 years ago long after its planned 3-year lifetime returned to our planet Wednesday, according to the European Space Agen… [+2270 chars]

articles.title: Pioneering European ERS-2 satellite falls to Earth over Pacific | BBC News - BBC News
articles.description: A European satellite that pioneered many of the technologies used to monitor the planet and its climate has fallen to Earth. The two-tonne ERS-2 spacecraft b...
